snippet.title: My Lovely Empress - Official Gameplay Trailer | Game Devs of Color Expo 2024
snippet.description: Check out the latest trailer for My Lovely Empress to see gameplay and more from this empire management sim inspired by Asian mythology. My Lovely Empress is available now on PC, Nintendo Switch, and Xbox Series X/S, and coming to PS5. As the Emperor of the Crimson Empire, you will build relations with neighboring rulers, balance internal factions, and ensure the prosperity of your people, all before you reap their souls to resurrect your beloved empress.
